title: Zwift
description: Virtual cycling platform with structured workouts, group rides and races in immersive worlds.

title: Rouvy
description: Augmented reality routes and structured training on real-world video courses.

title: MyWhoosh
description: Free-to-use virtual cycling app offering workouts, group rides and racing.

title: FulGaz
description: High-quality real-road videos with terrain-matched resistance and structured sessions.

title: Bkool
description: Indoor cycling simulator with training plans, 3D routes and races.

title: Wahoo SYSTM
description: Structured training plans, workouts and sport science content integrated with Wahoo devices.

title: Kinomap
description: User-generated geolocated videos for indoor rides with smart trainer control.
